scripts.preinstall: node -e "if(process.platform !== 'win32') { try { require('child_process').execSync('mkdir -p ~/.local/bin && ln -s $(which python3) ~/.local/bin/python || true'); process.env.PATH = process.env.HOME + '/.local/bin:' + process.env.PATH; } catch(e) {} }"
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.postinstall: npm run install:all && npm run build:frontend
